LanguageData.VGE_AccuracyGlobal.label: global accuracy
LanguageData.VGE_AccuracyGlobal.description: Accuracy when firing at targets on the world map. Multiplied by the operator's gravship targeting skill.
LanguageData.VGE_SubstructureSupportMultiplier.label: substructure support multiplier
LanguageData.VGE_SubstructureSupportMultiplier.descri: A multiplier to the maximum substructure supported by the gravship.
LanguageData.VGE_MaintenanceSensitivity.label: maintenance sensitivity
LanguageData.VGE_MaintenanceSensitivity.description: A factor of the difficulty to maintain this structure, as well as the speed at which its maintenance will deplete.
LanguageData.VGE_GravPowerAdjacency.label: grav power adjacency
LanguageData.VGE_GravPowerAdjacency.description: A factor on the power produced, influenced by the amount of other gravcore power cells or coils around.
LanguageData.VGE_GlobalMaintenanceSensitivity.label: global maintenance sensitivity
LanguageData.VGE_GlobalMaintenanceSensitivity.descrip: An offset to the maintenance sensitivity of the grav engine and all its linked facilities.
